description: The ODC_USER_CTX_OWNER table contains the user created context owner information for the order context record.

columns.name: ORDER_CONTEXT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order context record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: USER_CTX_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the provider who created the order context record.
